maple_syrup.description: Thick, golden syrup with restorative properties. Delicious and highly effective at healing wounds.

effects.description: Heal 500 HP when the item is used.

earth_res_potion.description: A potion that hardens skin like stone. Grants additional resistance to earth-based attacks.

effects.description: Gives 10% earth resistance at the start of fight.

fire_res_potion.description: A cool, red liquid that creates a protective barrier against flames when consumed.

effects.description: Gives 10% fire resistance at the start of fight.

water_res_potion.description: A bubbling blue potion that grants protection against water damage when drunk.

effects.description: Gives 10% water resistance at the start of fight.

air_res_potion.description: A swirling green potion that provides resistance against air-based attacks when consumed.

effects.description: Gives 10% air resistance at the start of fight.

celest_ring.description: A ring said to have been forged from a fallen star. It enhances both fire and water magic.

effects.description: Adds 25% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

frozen_pickaxe.description: A pickaxe encased in perpetual ice that never melts. The cold enhances its ability to break through even the hardest rock with ease.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character mines a resource.

frozen_gloves.description: Gloves that radiate cold yet keep your hands warm. Plants seem to yield to your touch, making harvesting remarkably efficient.

effects.description: Adds 5 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character harvest a plant.

frozen_fishing_rod.description: A fishing rod made of crystal-clear ice that never melts. Fish seem irresistibly drawn to its gleaming line.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character is fishing.

frozen_axe.description: An axe with a blade of magical ice that cuts through wood like it's butter. The cold seems to make trees surrender their wood more willingly.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character logs a tree.

page_from_hell.description: A scorched page torn from some unholy tome. The writing shifts and changes when you try to read it, and it feels unnaturally warm. These pages can be exchanged for a powerful item.

elemental_page.description: A strange page covered in elemental symbols that seem to move and interact with each other. It hums with magical energy. These pages can be exchanged for a powerful item.

grimlet_bone.description: A massive bone from the fearsome Grimlet beast. It's unnaturally heavy and radiates a faint aura of dread.

bow_from_hell.description: A bow that seems to have been forged in hellfire itself. Its arrows leave trails of brimstone in the air.

effects.description: Adds 106 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 24% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

hell_staff.description: A staff crackling with infernal power. Its wielder can command waters to boil and freeze at will.

effects.description: Adds 115 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

demoniac_dagger.description: A twisted dagger that seems to have been forged in the depths of hell itself. Its blade flickers with unholy flames.

effects.description: Adds 85 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

effects.description: Adds 250 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

effects.description: Adds 115 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

effects.description: Gives 12% water resistance at the start of fight.
Gives 12% fire resistance at the start of fight.
